amendatorysection.catchline: Early childhood education program; enrollment of kindergarten age children authorized.
amendatorysection.para: For school years 2008-09 and 2009-10, any early childhood education program as defined in section 79-1101 established by a school board or an educational service unit that is not receiving a grant pursuant to section 79-1103 or funding through the Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act may enroll children who meet the age requirements to be enrolled in kindergarten pursuant to section 79-214, but who are not then enrolled in kindergarten and who are not of mandatory attendance age pursuant to section 79-201.

crossreference.para: Tax Equity and Educational Opportunities Support Act, see section 79-1001.
